entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as having a least favorite class, Potions.

entities.name: potions
entities.description: Potions is Harry's second least favorite class after Divination. It is mentioned that he has to take this class.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is the teacher of Divination. She is described as a thin woman with a habit of predicting Harry's premature death.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and classmates. He emerges from the trapdoor to join Harry in the Divination class.

relationships.description: Harry has Potions as his second least favorite class after Divination.
Professor Trelawney predicts Harry's premature death in her classes.
Ron joins Harry in the Divination class.
